meanings.definition: Euroky (noun): a type of currency used in Europe
meanings.sent1: I used euroky to buy souvenirs in Paris.
meanings.sent2: The shop accepted euroky for payment.
meanings.sent3: The tourist's wallet was full of colorful euroky.
meanings.sent4: Her purse jingled with euroky as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The euroky bills had famous landmarks printed on them.

meanings.definition: Euroky (adjective): relating to or denoting the European currency
meanings.sent1: The euroky coins were shiny and new.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using euroky notes when traveling.
meanings.sent3: The euroky exchange rate was favorable for tourists.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was filled with euroky bills from different countries.
meanings.sent5: The euroky banknotes had intricate designs on them.

meanings.definition: Euroky (verb): to convert or exchange currency into euros
meanings.sent1: I need to euroky my dollars before my trip.
meanings.sent2: She eurokied her savings into euros for the vacation.
meanings.sent3: He eurokies his money whenever he travels abroad.
meanings.sent4: The bank offers a service to euroky foreign currencies.
meanings.sent5: They decided to euroky their yen into euroky for the trip.
